Column.name: Note
Column.value: A management plan to assess the coverage and impact of internal/customer campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A package of services and goods, accompanied by term and condition which is offered as a whole to (internal or external) customers.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A specific role that is palyed by a specific party in the Customer Campaign e.g. "Employee/BusinessUnit" who is responsible for the campaign execution; "RelationshipManager" who confirms eligibility of the candidate if appropriate

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A specific relationship between a specific Bank (= party acting as a supplier of banking services) and one or more other involved parties acting as (potential) consumers of banking services as agreed in one or more banking product or service offerings and/or agreements.

Column.name: Note
Column.value:
A series of organized actions which are done for one purpose.
A systemic course of actions formulated to achieve defined objectives.
campaign. BusinessDictionary.com. Retrieved August 23, 2018, from BusinessDictionary.com website: http://www.businessdictionary.com/definition/campaign.html

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A campaign to target specific individuals (current customers) that have been matched to the specific product/service in focus.

Column.name: Note
Column.value:
A responsibility of task (under management).
Duties are a collection of one or more responsibilities or tasks under management. (Behavior Qualifier Type)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A metric to evaluate the customer campaign - to assess the target and actual impact of the customer campaign - to select/identify candidate customers

Column.name: Note
Column.value:
The course of action to realize goals (of an operational unit of an enterprise).
The management and oversight while running an operational unit of an enterprise. (Generic Artifact)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A evaluation of customer campaign : - to assess the impact of the customer campaign. - to select the active customers to be included in the customer campaign

Column.name: Note
Column.value:
Customer polling to identify their level of satisfaction with an existing product/service, relationship and etc.
Customer polling to identify their level of satisfaction with an existing product, and to discover their express and hidden needs and expectations for new or proposed product(s).
Read more: http://www.businessdictionary.com/definition/customer-survey.html

Column.name: Note
Column.value:
A party represents an autonomous entity in which a bank has a business interest. It has a legal definition and identity. A party is a Person, Organization, (a proposed definition for BIAN BOM adapted from BIAN Party Working Group)
- Entity involved in an activity. (ISO20022)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The action or activity of gathering information about target markets or customers.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Duty to manage/assess the custome campaign

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A specific role of a specific Party in the specific relationship.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: An assessment of the strengths and weaknesses of current and potential competitors

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The identifier of product e.g. ISIN Code.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Specifies the category/type/class of product like financial product. Product can be categorized according to different perspectives.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Refers to the lifecycle of a product (e.g., initiated, announced, active, obsolete, withdrawn).

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A detailed explanation or commentary of product.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Track competitor activity and customer behavioral insights to assess required active customer campaign coverage and goals

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Assess coverage and performance of the customer campaign portfolio

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Direct the development/refinement of customer campaigns and initiate campaign execution as appropriate

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Type of campaign.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The version of campaign.

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The type or category of customer campaign (e.g. cross-sell, up-sell, retention)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The outcome or result of the work task

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Key dates associated with the work task

Column.name: Note
Column.value: File of consolidated notes, evaluations and recommendations for the work task

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A description of the metric, defining how it is to be measured in campaign deployment

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A description of the target performance for the metric that can be defined for different usage scenarios as appropriate

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The time period addressed by the management plan.

Column.name: Name
Column.value: Management Plan Description

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The type or category of customer survey (e.g. questionnaire, in context solicitation, focus group)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: A description of the customer survey that clarifies the sought customer insights, survey mechanism and target reviewers

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Key dates associated with the customer survey (e.g. initiation date, version revision date, completion date)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party. (ISO20022)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Specifies the type of party in different business contexts. (ISO20022)

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Refers to information (e.g. Market research report) used in the Market Research

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Refers to the viewpoint used in the market research

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Refers to the approach used in the market research

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Period covered by the market research

Column.name: Note
Column.value: Market that is subject of the market research

Column.name: Note
Column.value: The type of duty for customer campaign management

Column.name: Name
Column.value: Customer Campaign Management BOM Diagram
